categories: Category:Articles with elements from unlicensed sources

nodes.text: The Old Ones were the original inhabitants of the Kathol sector. The Kathol were said to have decended from them. Abeloth was said to be one of them.
In the novella Supernatural Encounters: The Trial and Transformation of Arhul Hextrophon, it's revealed that the Old Ones are also referred to as the Destructors by the Keshiri.
